headline: Citigroup reduces bonuses paid in 2024 for regulatory fixes
summary: Citigroup paid top executives smaller bonuses last year tied to results of the bank's turnaround and risk management fixes required by regulators, the bank's proxy filing on Tuesday showed.  The bonuses went to executive management committee members and 250 senior managers considered critical to execute changes required in 2020 by the Federal Reserve and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, the filing said.  The group excludes CEO Jane Fraser.

headline: BlackRock Basic Value V.I. Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund posted a return of -2.28% (Class I shares) for the fourth quarter of 2024. The largest exposures were in the financials, health care, and industrials sectors.
